description: Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline for chatbot that ingests documents, retrieves context, and stream answers.
Engineered hot-memory caching for summarization prompts, using Redis to manage conversation history; decreased latency by 54% and enhanced response times by 700 milliseconds.
Full‑stack e‑commerce platform for consumer electronics built on Java Servlets/Tomcat with MongoDB + MySQL.
Features catalog search, shopping cart, checkout, order history, and an admin dashboard for inventory & pricing. Focused on clean domain modeling and ACID guarantees for orders.

Android app showing current conditions, next 48‑hour hourly, and 7‑day forecasts with location awareness and graceful error states. Consumes a public weather REST API and caches recent results to reduce calls.

Algorithmic toolkit that explores separating planar point sets with axis‑parallel lines, including heuristics and exact routines. Includes visualization, complexity analysis, and experiment harness for benchmarking on synthetic datasets.

Exploratory + predictive analytics on Chicago crime data. Combined time‑series techniques (expanding window) with ML baselines to compare forecast accuracy; built clean data pipelines and visual dashboards for trend analysis.
Personal site showcasing projects, experience, and writing. Built with React + Tailwind, animated particles, EmailJS contact form, and a responsive design system.
